page.title: 16Supermarket,Bradford
page.content: The super market is a large multi- department store situated near a major road junction for traffic from Bradford,Leeds and Harrogate.Most of the staff employed are local and mostly part-time.Their jobs include trades assistants,supermarket assistants,butchers and bakers.They have an establishment of 182 plus the management team.All the staff are described as multi-skilled.All the tills are computerised as are stock control and sales figures. The store was opened early in 1985 and is part of a development programme aimed at providing easy shopping facilities for a large area and a large number of people.In the future the manager hopes that they can expand their range of products whilst maintaining high all round standards.
